backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing coupons, user redemptions, and history with add, redeem, and query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing PWA-related features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend files including components, hooks, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme definitions.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry containing PWA metadata, manifest link, and icon references.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining name, icons, colors, start URL, and PWA install settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Offline fallback page with styled message and retry button shown when the app is unreachable.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and offline-first fetch handling.
frontend/README.md: README explaining app features, PWA installation steps on major platforms, and how to find the production URL.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling Internet Identity auth and service worker registration, rendering landing or main layout.
frontend/src/components/feedback/NewCoup: Banner component showing new coupon notifications with dismiss logic and animation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Sticky header displaying logo and title for authenticated screens.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomNav: Renders a bottom navigation bar with four tabs and highlights the active one, triggering tab changes on click.
Defines the main layout with header, banner, tabbed content switching, and a bottom navigation bar.
frontend/src/features/auth/LandingPage.t: Displays the marketing landing page with hero content and a login button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/features/brands/BrandDetail: Shows a bottom sheet with detailed brand info and coupons, allowing users to copy coupon codes.
Lists brands with search and opens a detail sheet when a brand is selected.
frontend/src/features/brands/useBrands.t: Aggregates coupons by brand and returns a sorted brand list with loading and error states.
frontend/src/features/coupons/CouponList: Displays an individual coupon with copy and redeem actions, handling states and expiration.
frontend/src/features/coupons/CouponsPag: Loads and displays all coupons sorted by expiration, showing status and error states.
frontend/src/features/coupons/HomePage.t: Displays today's coupon, allows copying and redeeming, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/features/coupons/useCoupons: Fetches coupon history via actor and derives the most recent valid coupon.
frontend/src/features/coupons/useRedeemC: Provides a mutation to redeem a coupon and refreshes coupon data on success.
frontend/src/features/notifications/useN: Detects when a new coupon appears compared to last seen and exposes a dismiss action.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfilePag: Shows user identity info, logout option, and coupon statistics.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing and exposing identity and login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, effects, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state and plan for rebuilding the coupon app using React Native and Firebase, including architecture notes, required images, and listed existing features. Contains no code but outlines functional requirements, navigation, data needs, and release pipeline expectations.
